definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[עחה]] (√ of foll.; meaning dub.; cf. Sab. [[עחַם]] wood DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 341, 412, Ar. gid.ah;un, orig. 9id.ahah;un nom. unit. of  9id.a0hu large, thorny trees (v. Lane; also Nö:GGA 1862, 544; ZMG xxxii (1878), 406 Lag:BN 158 f.); Eth. 9z’:: tree, wood; As. iṣ(ṣ)u; Ph. [[עץ]] wood; NH = BH; Aram. [[אָע]] (init. [[א]] by dissim.); Ba:NB § 2, c. 1 thinks originally bilit.).
